title: Private lending goes online as matchmaking platform Dealt launches
text:
ASX-listed 360 Capital Group has invested in a new private property lending marketplace, Dealt, which will allow property developers to pitch their projects to a smorgasbord of lenders online.

Developer appetite for private loans and lenders looking for deals to fund have led to the launch of the website, led by Dealt chief executive and former broker Shaun Smith.

Dealt CEO Shaun Smith will pitch the platform to both brokers and developers.

It took 18 months to build the site, Mr Smith said. The value of 360 Capital's investment is however confidential.

"Online lending proliferates in the residential and small business sectors, but no platform exists for commercial real estate and development finance,” Mr Smith said.

"When we started our research, we were astonished to find that it appears we are the first in the world to launch a platform such as this. Others have tried but as far as we can ascertain, none have progressed.
description: ASX-listed 360 Capital Group has invested in a new private property lending marketplace, Dealt.
